Question.Subject: Where can I host a file for free on the internet?
Question.Content: So I need to make a 140 minutes mp3 recording file available for download on the internet. What is a good website for this?
Question.ChosenAnswer: Hello, i tried for free web hosting site ,but there is no chance ,if it is any ,that also makes problem .so for that i found a very cheap rate hosting service provider in this http://www.thewebpole.com/ site ,here i got my domain at just $1.99 per year.

Answer.Content: http://fastfreefilehosting.com/ is a file hosting service for files < 50MB in size
